titles: Orchestra or A poeme of dauncing Iudicially proouing the true obseruation of time and measure, in the authenticall and laudable vse of dauncing.
author: Davies, John, Sir, 1569-1626.
publisher: Printed by I. Robarts for N. Ling,
notes: Running title reads: A poeme of dauncing.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
